titleStmt.title: The coppie of a letter sent from M. Rider, deane of Saint Patricks, concerning the Newes out of Ireland, and of the Spaniards landing and present estate there
titleStmt.author: Rider, John, 1562-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by F. Kingston] for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
